title: Home Base
description: Starting point for GPS tracking adventures. This is where the ESP32 device is typically configured and tested.

title: City Center
description: Main city center with shops, restaurants, and landmarks. Good place to test GPS accuracy in urban environment.

title: Park Entrance
description: Beautiful park perfect for testing GPS tracking during walks. Features walking trails and outdoor activities.

title: Coffee Shop
description: Local coffee shop with WiFi. Great spot to monitor GPS tracking data while enjoying a warm beverage.

title: Tech Hub
description: Local technology center and maker space. Perfect for ESP32 development and troubleshooting.

title: Viewpoint
description: Scenic overlook with great views of the surrounding area. Excellent for testing GPS altitude readings.
